TEXT.English: Accept
TEXT.French: Accepter
TEXT.Italian: Accept

TEXT.English: Accept the decision and leave the city
TEXT.French: Accepter la décision et quitter la ville
TEXT.Italian: Accetta la decisione e lascia la città.
TEXT.Spanish: Aceptar la decisión y ceder la ciudad

TEXT.English: Attempt to bribe their representatives (%s2: %d1 [ICON_GOLD])
TEXT.French: Tenter de soudoyer leurs délégués (%s2 : %d1 [ICON_GOLD])
TEXT.Italian: Attempt to bribe their representatives (%s2: %d1 [ICON_GOLD])

TEXT.English: The congress is currently debating the %s2 claim on our city of %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?
TEXT.French: Le congrès discute de la revendication %s2 sur notre ville de %s3, et il serait possible d'influencer la décision %s1. Que devons-nous faire ?
TEXT.German: Der Kongress debattiert im Moment die %s2 Forderung unserer Stadt %s3, und es könnte möglich sein, die %s1 Entscheidung zu beeinflussen. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: The congress is currently debating the %s2 claim on our city of %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: The congress is currently debating the %s2 claim on our city of %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 opinion on our claim on the %s2 city of %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?
TEXT.French: L'opinion %s1 quant à notre revendication de la ville %s2 de %s3 est partagée. Il serait possible d'influencer leur décision. Que devons-nous faire ?
TEXT.German: Die %s1 Meinungen zu unserer Forderung der %s2 Stadt %s3 sind gespalten. Es könnte möglich sein, ihre Entscheidung zu beeinflussen. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: %s1 opinion on our claim on the %s2 city of %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 opinion on our claim on the %s2 city of %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 opinion on our request to colonize the %s2 territory near %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?
TEXT.French: L'opinion %s1 quant à notre demande de colonisation du territoire %s2 à proximité de %s3 est partagée. Il serait possible d'influencer leur décision. Que devons-nous faire ?
TEXT.German: Die %s1 Meinungen zu unserem Antrag, das %s2 Gebiet nahe %s3 zu kolonisieren, ist gespalten. Es könnte möglich sein, ihre Entscheidung zu beeinflussen. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: %s1 opinion on our request to colonize the %s2 territory near %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 opinion on our request to colonize the %s2 territory near %s3 is divided. It might be possible to influence their decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They have voted against our claim, and our relations have soured in consequence.
TEXT.French: [NUM1:Le:La] %s1 a rejeté notre tentative maladroite d'influencer leur décision ! Ils ont voté contre notre demande, et nos relations avec eux se sont dégradées.
TEXT.German: %s1 hat unsere ungeschickten Versuche, ihre Entscheidung zu beeinflussen, zurückgewiesen! Sie haben gegen unsere Forderung gestimmt, und in Folge haben sich unsere Beziehungen verschlechtert.
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They have voted against our claim, and our relations have soured in consequence.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They have voted against our claim, and our relations have soured in consequence.

TEXT.English: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now support our claim.
TEXT.French: La tentative a réussi ! [NUM1:Le:La] %s1 appuiera donc notre demande.
TEXT.German: Der Versuch war erfolgreich! %s1 wird unsere Forderung nun unterstützen.
TEXT.Italian: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now support our claim.
TEXT.Spanish: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now support our claim.

TEXT.English: The congress is currently debating the %s2 request to colonize our territory near %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?
TEXT.French: Le congrès discute de la demande %s2 de coloniser notre territoire à proximité de %s3, et il serait possible d'influencer la décision %s1. Que devons-nous faire ?
TEXT.German: Der Kongress debattiert im Moment den %s2 Antrag, unser Gebiet nahe %s3 zu kolonisieren, und es könnte möglich sein, die %s1 Entscheidung zu beeinflussen. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: The congress is currently debating the %s2 request to colonize our territory near %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: The congress is currently debating the %s2 request to colonize our territory near %s3, and it might be possible to influence the %s1 decision. What should we do?

TEXT.English: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They will now support the claim against us, and our relations have soured in consequence.
TEXT.French: [NUM1:Le:La] %s1 a rejeté notre tentative maladroite d'influencer leur décision ! Ils appuieront donc la demande contraire à nos intérêts, et nos relations avec eux se sont dégradées.
TEXT.German: %s1 hat unsere ungeschickten Versuche, ihre Entscheidung zu beeinflussen, zurückgewiesen! Sie werden nun die gegen uns gerichtete Forderung unterstützen, und in Folge haben sich unsere Beziehungen verschlechtert.
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They will now support the claim against us, and our relations have soured in consequence.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has rejected our clumsy attempts to influence their decision! They will now support the claim against us, and our relations have soured in consequence.

TEXT.English: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now vote against the claim against us.
TEXT.French: La tentative a réussi ! [NUM1:Le:La] %s1 votera donc contre la demande contraire à nos intérêts.
TEXT.German: Der Versuch war erfolgreich! %s1 wird nun gegen die gegen uns gerichtete Forderung stimmen.
TEXT.Italian: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now vote against the claim against us.
TEXT.Spanish: The attempt was successful! %s1 will now vote against the claim against us.

TEXT.English: Unfortunately, we lack the means to do anything.
TEXT.French: Nous n'avons malheureusement pas les moyens de faire quoi que ce soit.
TEXT.German: Leider fehlen uns die Mittel, etwas zu tun.
TEXT.Italian: Unfortunately, we lack the means to do anything.
TEXT.Spanish: Unfortunately, we lack the means to do anything.

TEXT.English: Average
TEXT.French: Moyenne
TEXT.Italian: Average

TEXT.English: High
TEXT.French: Haute
TEXT.Italian: High

TEXT.English: Very High
TEXT.French: Très haute
TEXT.Italian: Very High

TEXT.English: It is now our turn to make a demand.
TEXT.French: C'est à notre tour de faire une demande.
TEXT.German: Wir sind nun an der Reihe, eine Forderung zu stellen.
TEXT.Italian: It is now our turn to make a demand.
TEXT.Spanish: It is now our turn to make a demand.

TEXT.English: They refused our proposal with indignation. Now they might even vote against our interests!
TEXT.French: Ils ont refusé avec indignation notre proposition. À présent, ils vont peut-être voter contre notre intérêt !
TEXT.German: Sie haben unser Angebot empört abgelehnt. Jetzt werden sie vermutlich erst recht nicht in unserem Sinne abstimmen!
TEXT.Italian: Hanno rifiutato la nostra proposta, indignandosi. Ora potrebbero addirittura votare contro i nostri interessi!
TEXT.Spanish: Han rechazado nuestra propuesta con indignación. ¡Ahora podrían incluso votar en contra de nuestros intereses!

TEXT.English: How much gold shall we use for this purpose?
TEXT.French: Combien d'or devons-nous utiliser pour cela ?
TEXT.German: Wie viel Gold wollt Ihr dafür aufwenden?
TEXT.Italian: Quanto oro dovremmo usare a questo scopo?
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Cuánto oro debemos invertir en esta empresa?

TEXT.English: They refused our proposal.
TEXT.French: Ils ont refusé notre proposition.
TEXT.Italian: Hanno rifiutato la nostra proposta.

TEXT.English: We can use some of our gold to try to bribe another civilization to vote for our interests. Do you want to attempt?
TEXT.French: Nous pouvons utiliser notre or pour soudoyer une autre civilisation, afin qu'elle vote selon notre intérêt. Voulez-vous essayer ?
TEXT.German: Wir könnten versuchen, eine andere Nation mit Gold zu bestechen, damit sie in unserem Sinne abstimmt. Wollt Ihr es wagen?
TEXT.Italian: Possiamo usare un po' del nostro oro per provare a convincere un'altra civiltà a votare a nostro favore. Vuoi provare?
TEXT.Spanish: Podemos usar parte de nuestro oro para sobornar a otra civilización con objeto de que vote según nuestros intereses. ¿Queréis intentarlo?

TEXT.English: They accepted our proposal. They will vote for our interests.
TEXT.French: Ils ont accepté notre proposition. Ils voteront selon notre intérêt.
TEXT.German: Sie sind auf unser Angebot eingegangen und werden in unserem Sinne abstimmen.
TEXT.Italian: Hanno accettato la nostra proposta. Voteranno a nostro favore.
TEXT.Spanish: Han aceptado nuestra propuesta. Votarán a favor de nuestros intereses.

TEXT.English: The congress has decided to hand over our city of %s2 to %s1. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.French: Le congrès a décidé de céder notre ville de %s2 à [NUM1:le:la] %s1. Devons-nous accepter ? Un refus pourra causer une guerre contre les partisans de cette décision. Les civilisations suivantes ont voté contre nous :[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.German: Der Kongress hat entschieden, unsere Stadt %s2 an %s1 zu übergeben. Sollen wir dieser Forderung nachkommen? Eine Weigerung kann zum Krieg gegen die Unterstützer dieser Entscheidung führen. Die folgenden Zivilisationen stimmten gegen uns:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.Italian: The congress has decided to hand over our city of %s2 to %s1. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.Spanish: The congress has decided to hand over our city of %s2 to %s1. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3

TEXT.English: The congress has decided to allow %s1 to colonize our territory near %s2. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.French: Le congrès a décider de permettre à [NUM1:le:la] %s1 de coloniser notre territoire à proximité de %s2. Devons-nous accepter ? Un refus pourra causer une guerre contre les partisans de cette décision. Les civilisations suivantes ont voté contre nous :[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.German: Der Kongress hat entschieden, %s1 die Erlaubnis zu gewähren, unser Territorium nahe %s2 zu kolonisieren. Sollen wir dieser Forderung nachkommen? Eine Weigerung kann zum Krieg geegn die Unterstützer dieser Entscheidung führen. Die folgenden Zivilisationen stimmten gegen uns:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.Italian: The congress has decided to allow %s1 to colonize our territory near %s2. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3
TEXT.Spanish: The congress has decided to allow %s1 to colonize our territory near %s2. Shall we comply with their demand? Refusal may lead to war against the supporters of this decision. The following civilizations voted against us:[NEWLINE]%s3

TEXT.English: What city shall we ask for?
TEXT.French: Quelle ville allons-nous réclamer ?
TEXT.Italian: Che città dovremmo richiedere?

TEXT.English: A new international Congress is about to start.[NEWLINE]The leaders of some of the most important nations will meet there to discuss the balance of the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each side will have its turn to ask a city; if the decision is approved the owner of the city that is being traded must accept it.[NEWLINE]If you refuse a decision, you are likely to face a war against some of the sides that voted YES.
TEXT.French: Un nouveau congrès international est sur le point de commencer.[NEWLINE]Les dirigeants des plus grandes nations vont s'y rencontrer pour discuter de l'équilibre mondial.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Chacun pourra à son tour réclamer une ville ; si la décision est approuvée, le possesseur de la ville échangée doit l'accepter.[NEWLINE]Si vous refusez une décision, vous risquez d'entrer en guerre contre ceux qui ont voté OUI.
TEXT.German: In Kürze wird ein neuer internationaler Kongress beginnen.[NEWLINE]Die Staatsoberhäupter einiger der wichtigsten Nationen werden dort zusammentreffen, um die Machtverhältnisse in der Welt zu erörtern.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Jede Partei kann der Reihe nach eine Stadt fordern. Wird der Forderung per Votum entsprochen, muss der bisherige Besitzer der betreffenden Stadt diese Entscheidung akzeptieren.[NEWLINE]Die Widersetzung gegen diese Entscheidung kommt in der Regel einer Kriegserklärung gegenüber einigen der Parteien gleich, die mit JA gestimmt haben.
TEXT.Italian: Sta per cominciare un nuovo congresso internazionale.[NEWLINE]I leader di alcune delle nazioni più importanti si incontreranno per discutere dell'equilibrio mondiale.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ogni fazione avrà modo di richiedere una città, a turno; se la decisione viene approvata il possessore della città dovrà accettare la transazione.[NEWLINE]Se rifiuti potresti trovarti in guerra contro alcune delle fazioni che hanno votato SÌ.
TEXT.Spanish: Está a punto de comenzar un nuevo Congreso internacional.[NEWLINE]Los líderes de algunas de las naciones más importantes se encuentran aquí para discutir sobre la estabilidad mundial.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cada parte tendrá un turno para solicitar una ciudad; si la decisión es aprobada, el propietario de la ciudad a intercambiar debe aceptar.[NEWLINE]Si os negáis a aceptar una decisión, podríais ser objeto de una declaración de guerra por parte de los que votaron SÍ.

TEXT.English: A World Congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Maybe we aren't important enough.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense.
TEXT.French: Un congrès mondial va avoir lieu, mais nous n'avons pas été invité. Nous ne sommes peut-être pas suffisamment importants.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Nous ne pouvons qu'attendre leurs décisions et avoir confiance en leur jugement.
TEXT.German: Zurzeit findet ein Weltkongress statt, zu dem Ihr jedoch nicht eingeladen wurdet. Vielleicht ist unsere Nation einfach nicht bedeutend genug.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Uns bleibt nun wohl nichts anderes übrig, als die Entscheidungen der Teilnehmer abzuwarten und zu hoffen, dass sie ihren gesunden Menschenverstand nutzen.
TEXT.Italian: Si tiene un congresso internazionale, ma non siamo stati invitati. Forse non siamo abbastanza importanti.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ora possiamo solo aspettare le loro decisioni e confidare nel loro buon senso.
TEXT.Spanish: Se está celebrando un Congreso Mundial, pero no hemos sido invitados. Quizá no seamos lo bastante importantes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ahora solo podemos esperar sus decisiones y confiar en su sentido común.

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A new international congress is being held. The leaders of the world's most important civilizations convene to discuss the balance of the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization is allowed to either claim a city or request to colonize unsettled territory. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.French: [H1]Congrès de %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Un nouveau congrès international est en cours. Les dirigeants des civilisations les plus importantes se réunissent pour discuter de l'équilibre mondial. En plus de notre civilisation, les participants sont :[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Chaque civilisation peut revendiquer une ville ou demander de coloniser un territoire inhabité. Si assez de civilisations donnent leur approbation, la demande est accordée. Tout refus d'accepter une décision du congrès risque de causer une guerre avec les civilisations qui l'ont appuyée !
TEXT.German: [H1]Kongress von %s1[\H1][NEWLINe]Ein neuer internationaler Kongress wird abgehalten. Die Anführer der wichtigsten Zivilisationen der Welt kommen zusammen, um das Gleichgewicht der Welt zu diskutieren. Neben unserer Zivilisation sind unter den Teilnehmern:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Jede Zivilisation darf entweder eine Stadt beanspruchen oder um die Kolonisierung unbesiedelter Gebiete anfragen. Falls genügen Zivilisationen zustimmen, wird der Anfrage stattgegeben. Eine Weigerung, der Entscheidung des Kongresses nachzukommen, kann zum Krieg mit den Zivilisationen führen, die sie unterstützt haben!
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A new international congress is being held. The leaders of the world's most important civilizations convene to discuss the balance of the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization is allowed to either claim a city or request to colonize unsettled territory. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A new international congress is being held. The leaders of the world's most important civilizations convene to discuss the balance of the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization is allowed to either claim a city or request to colonize unsettled territory. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A world congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Apparently we are not important enough. The fate of the world is now in the hands of the following civilizations:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense.
TEXT.French: [H1]Congrès de %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Un congrès mondial est en cours, mais nous n'avons pas été invités. Il semble que nous ne soyons pas assez importants. Le sort du monde est désormais entre les mains des civilisations suivantes :[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Nous ne pouvons qu'attendre leurs décisions et avoir confiance en leur jugement.
TEXT.German: [H1]Kongress von %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Ein Weltkongress wird abgehalten, aber wir wurden nicht eingeladen. Scheinbar sind wir nicht wichtig genug. Das Schicksal der Welt liegt nun in den Händen der folgenden Zivilisationen:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Jetzt können wir nur noch ihre Entscheidungen abwarten und auf ihren gesunden Menschenverstand vertrauen.
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A world congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Apparently we are not important enough. The fate of the world is now in the hands of the following civilizations:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense.
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A world congress is being held, but we haven't been invited. Apparently we are not important enough. The fate of the world is now in the hands of the following civilizations:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Now we can only await their decisions and trust in their common sense.

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. We were not involved, but were still invited due to our international importance. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization on the winning side of the war is allowed to claim a city from the losing side, while the civilizations that have lost may reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.French: [H1]Congrès de %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Une grande guerre internationale a pris fin. Les puissances impliquées se réunissent en congrès pour discuter de la restauration de l'ordre mondial. Nous n'avons pas participé à la guerre, mais nous avons tout de même été invités en raison de notre poids international. En plus de notre civilisation, les participants sont :[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Chaque vainqueur peut revendiquer une ville appartenant à une civilisation vaincue, tandis que chaque vaincu peut demander de récupérer une ville perdue pendant la guerre. Si assez de civilisations donnent leur approbation, la demande est accordée. Tout refus d'accepter une décision du congrès risque de causer une guerre avec les civilisations qui l'ont appuyée !
TEXT.German: [H1]Kongress von %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Ein großer internationaler Krieg ist zu Ende gegangen. Die involvierten Mächte kommen zusammen, um Ordnung in der Welt wiederherzustellen. Wir waren nicht beteiligt, aber wurden wegen unserer internationalen Bedeutung dennoch eingeladen. Neben unserer Zivilisation sind unter den Teilnehmern:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Jede Zivilisation auf der Gewinnerseite des Kriegen darf eine Stadt von der Verliererseite beanspruchen, während die Zivilisationen, die verloren haben, während des Kriegens eroberte Städte zurückfordern können. Falls genügen Zivilisationen zustimmen, wird der Anfrage stattgegeben. Eine Weigerung, der Entscheidung des Kongresses nachzukommen, kann zum Krieg mit den Zivilisationen führen, die sie unterstützt haben!
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. We were not involved, but were still invited due to our international importance. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization on the winning side of the war is allowed to claim a city from the losing side, while the civilizations that have lost may reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. We were not involved, but were still invited due to our international importance. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every civilization on the winning side of the war is allowed to claim a city from the losing side, while the civilizations that have lost may reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Since we are on the winning side we can claim cities from the losers of the war, while they may attempt to reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.French: [H1]Congrès de %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Une grande guerre internationale a pris fin. Les puissances impliquées se réunissent en congrès pour discuter de la restauration de l'ordre mondial. En plus de notre civilisation, les participants sont :[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Puisque nous sommes du côté des vainqueurs, nous pouvons revendiquer des villes appartenant aux vaincus. Ces derniers tenteront quant à eux de récupérer des villes perdues durant la guerre. Si assez de civilisations donnent leur approbation, la demande est accordée. Tout refus d'accepter une décision du congrès risque de causer une guerre avec les civilisations qui l'ont appuyée !
TEXT.German: [H1]Kongress von %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Ein großer internationaler Krieg ist zu Ende gegangen. Die involvierten Mächte kommen zusammen, um Ordnung in der Welt wiederherzustellen. Neben unserer Zivilisation sind unter den Teilnehmern:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Da wir auf der Gewinnerseite sind, können wir Städte von den Verlierern des Krieges beanspruchen, während diese im Laufe des Krieges eroberte Städte zurückfordern können. Falls genügen Zivilisationen zustimmen, wird der Anfrage stattgegeben. Eine Weigerung, der Entscheidung des Kongresses nachzukommen, kann zum Krieg mit den Zivilisationen führen, die sie unterstützt haben!
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Since we are on the winning side we can claim cities from the losers of the war, while they may attempt to reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Since we are on the winning side we can claim cities from the losers of the war, while they may attempt to reclaim cities conquered during the war. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a loser of the war we can attempt to reclaim cities lost during the war, while the winners may make additional claims against us. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.French: [H1]Congrès de %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Une grande guerre internationale a pris fin. Les puissances impliquées se réunissent en congrès pour discuter de la restauration de l'ordre mondial. En plus de notre civilisation, les participants sont :[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]En tant que vaincus, nous pouvons tenter de récupérer les villes perdues pendant la guerre, tandis que les vainqueurs peuvent faire des revendications additionnelles à notre endroit. Si assez de civilisations donnent leur approbation, la demande est accordée. Tout refus d'accepter une décision du congrès risque de causer une guerre avec les civilisations qui l'ont appuyée !
TEXT.German: [H1]Kongress von %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Ein großer internationaler Krieg ist zu Ende gegangen. Die involvierten Mächte kommen zusammen, um Ordnung in der Welt wiederherzustellen. Neben unserer Zivilisation sind unter den Teilnehmern:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Als Verlierer des Krieges können wir versuchen, im Laufe des Krieges verlorene Städte zurückzufordern, während die Gewinner zusätzliche Ansprüche gegen uns geltend machen können. Falls genügen Zivilisationen zustimmen, wird der Anfrage stattgegeben. Eine Weigerung, der Entscheidung des Kongresses nachzukommen, kann zum Krieg mit den Zivilisationen führen, die sie unterstützt haben!
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a loser of the war we can attempt to reclaim cities lost during the war, while the winners may make additional claims against us. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The involved powers convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world. Besides our civilization, the participants are:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a loser of the war we can attempt to reclaim cities lost during the war, while the winners may make additional claims against us. If enough civilizations approve, the request is granted. Refusal to comply with the decision of the congress may lead to war with the civilizations that supported it!

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The belligerents convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world, but we were neither involved nor important enough to influence the process:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a non-belligerent, nobody can claim our cities.
TEXT.French: [H1]Congrès de %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Une grande guerre internationale a pris fin. Les belligérants se réunissent en congrès pour discuter de la restauration de l'ordre mondial, mais comme nous ne sommes pas concernés et ne sommes pas assez importants, nous ne pouvons pas influencer le processus :[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Puisque nous n'avons pas participé à la guerre, personne ne peut revendiquer nos villes.
TEXT.German: [H1]Kongress von %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Ein großer internationaler Krieg ist zu Ende gegangen. Die kriegführenden Mächte kommen zusammen, um Ordnung in der Welt wiederherzustellen, aber wir waren nicht beteiligt und sind nicht wichtig genug um die Entscheidungen zu beeinflussen:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Als Unbeteiligter kann niemand unsere Städte einfordern.
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The belligerents convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world, but we were neither involved nor important enough to influence the process:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a non-belligerent, nobody can claim our cities.
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]A great international war has come to an end. The belligerents convene in a congress to discuss how to restore order to the world, but we were neither involved nor important enough to influence the process:[NEWLINE]%s2[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As a non-belligerent, nobody can claim our cities.

TEXT.English: An international Congress is being held in 2 turns. You have been invited to participate. Will you accept the invitation?
TEXT.French: Un Congrès international aura lieu dans 2 tours. Vous avez été invité à y participer. Acceptez-vous l'invitation ?
TEXT.German: In 2 Runden wird ein internationaler Kongress stattfinden. Ihr wurdet eingeladen, daran teilzunehmen. Nehmt Ihr die Einladung an?
TEXT.Italian: Fra 2 turni si terrà un congresso internazionale. Sei stato invitato a partecipare. Accetterai l'invito?
TEXT.Spanish: Se va a celebrar un Congreso internacional en 2 turnos. Se os ha invitado a participar. ¿Aceptáis la invitación?

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]%s1
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]%s1
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]%s1

TEXT.Italian: Infiltrate their delegation (%s2: %d1 [ICON_ESPIONAGE])

TEXT.English: New Congress
TEXT.French: Nouveau Congrès
TEXT.Italian: Nuovo congresso

TEXT.English: makes no requests
TEXT.French: ne fait pas de requêtes
TEXT.Italian: non avanza richieste

TEXT.English: Let them vote as they please.
TEXT.French: Let them vote as they please.
TEXT.German: Lasst sie abstimmen, wie es ihnen gefällt.
TEXT.Italian: Let them vote as they please.
TEXT.Spanish: Let them vote as they please.

TEXT.English: There is no appropriate city to ask
TEXT.French: Il n'y a pas de ville appropriée à réclamer
TEXT.German: Es steht keine geeignete Stadt zur Auswahl
TEXT.Italian: Non ci sono città da richiedere
TEXT.Spanish: No hay una ciudad apropiada que solicitar

TEXT.English: NO REQUEST
TEXT.French: PAS DE REQUÊTE
TEXT.Italian: NESSUNA RICHIESTA

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]The members decided to uphold the status quo.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]Les délégués ont décidé de maintenir le status quo.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE]Die Mitglieder haben entschieden, den Status Quo aufrecht zu erhalten.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE]The members decided to uphold the status quo.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]The members decided to uphold the status quo.

TEXT.Italian: sta passando sotto il controllo di %s1

TEXT.Italian: sta passando sotto il controllo

TEXT.Italian: Congresso di %s1

TEXT.Italian: si astiene[NEWLINE]

TEXT.French: Refuser de quitter la ville !
TEXT.Italian: Rifiutati di lasciare la città!

TEXT.Italian: %s1 vuole %s2 (%s3)

TEXT.Italian: Il congresso ha deciso che

TEXT.Italian: debba essere assegnata a

TEXT.English: control.[NEWLINE]Do you agree? (Our refusal may lead to a war)
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE]Êtes-vous d'accord ? (Notre refus pourrait causer une guerre)
TEXT.German: übereignet werden sollte.[NEWLINE]Seid Ihr einverstanden? (Unsere Weigerung könnte einen Krieg nach sich ziehen)
TEXT.Italian: .[NEWLINE]Sei d'accordo? (Il rifiuto potrebbe portare a una guerra)
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE]¿Estáis de acuerdo? (Una negativa podría provocar una guerra)

TEXT.French: %s1 revendique la ville %s2 de %s3
TEXT.Italian: %s1 claims the %s2 city of %s3

TEXT.Spanish: %s1 requests to found %s2 on their own territory

TEXT.English: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]After long negotiations, the voting members of the Congress have come to the following decision:[NEWLINE]
TEXT.French: [H1]Congrès de %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Au bout de longues négociations, les délégués du congrès en sont arrivés à la décision suivante :[NEWLINE]
TEXT.German: [H1]Kongress von %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]Nach langen Verhandlung sind die stimmberechtigen Mitglieder des Kongresses zu folgender Entscheidung gekommen:[NEWLINE]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]After long negotiations, the voting members of the Congress have come to the following decision:[NEWLINE]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Congress of %s1[\H1][NEWLINE]After long negotiations, the voting members of the Congress have come to the following decision:[NEWLINE]
